page.title: 06EAST MERSEA CHURCH GROUPS
page.content: {CHOIR:}There are ten members in the choir, all of them girls.The choir meets every Sunday and for special occasions. {GROUPS:}There is a Sunday Club for children of all ages.This allows members of the Sunday School to go on outings and be involved in games and activities.There is a Young Wives group that meets every Thursday. Some parishioners hold house meetings. The vicar produces a free weekly leaflet of events and a monthly magazine with reports,pictures,and news. {ACTIVITIES:}The groups are involved in many charitable events including an annual fish party and weekly coffee mornings.The local Womans Guild have made new hassocks for the church depicting life and work in East Mersea.
